name: Teddy Bear Kids Zoo Games
description:
A young bear loves to catch butterflies. He’s a funny and playful little thing.

Hello children and welcome to the Kids Zoo Games series. The youngest member of our Zoo is Teddy the bear. He’s barely started to walk and is beginning to discover the world. He’s having fun catching butterflies, moles, mice… Will you help him?

• Concentrate and help the bear catch the animals.
• Watch out for the snake – he bites!
• Have some fun with a bear cub.
• Original content.
• Recommended for children over 2.
• Limited ads.
• No payments, the game is free!
